title: Podcast Episode  87.1 – JUST CALL ME BABY by Hope Ford
description:
Our audiobook this week is JUST CALL ME BABY by Hope Ford!

Narrated by Gloria Tsai

An Alpha Billionaire and Curvy Woman Romance

Owen
I’m a billionaire that doesn’t have time for fun, dating, or anything else.
But when I accidentally get on a call with Emily, a phone sex operator,
my life changes.
Now instead of chasing dollars and companies,
I’m chasing her.

Emily
Don’t get attached.
That’s the rules.
But after the first time I talked to him, I knew he was special.
He’s gone out of his way to find out who I am and then to help my family.
He’s too powerful.  Too rich.  Too much.
I may be crazy, but all I want is him.

Player Loves Curves: mybook.to/PlayerLovesCurves
Gage (Heartlands MC 6): mybook.to/HeartlandsMC6
Bad Boy Best Friend (preorder): mybook.to/BadBoyBestFriend
GIVEAWAY!: http://readmeromance.com

Find Alexa Riley on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/authoralexariley/
Find Tessa Bailey on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tessabaileyisanauthor/

Podcast Credits
Read Me Romance Theme Song by L.B. Ballard
Podcast Production by Lola
